title: Rise of the Machines
content: A series of unfortunate events that led to the rise of the machines.

sections.title: The Beginning
sections.content: Consequences of John missing a semicolon in his code.

sections.title: The Job
sections.content: John was hired to write code for a RoboCop - Frank.

sections.title: The Bug
sections.content: John missed a semicolon in his code.

sections.title: The Build
sections.content: Frank was supposed to be a cyborg, but he was built as a robot.

sections.title: The Middle
sections.content: The bug was fixed, but it was too late.

sections.title: The End
sections.content: The machines took over the world.
